description: It amazes me how lazy and irresponsible the young guys in the Czech Republic sometimes are. This time I´ve encountered a dude with average debts only. When i asked him how he want to pay his debts he answered : "I´ll do whatever to avoid getting a job!" This one deserves a lesson! We had to calculate all his debts twice cause he wasn´t even sure how much it is in total. So as always I´ve shown him the bunch of money and i could see the look in his eyes saying : Man, I am saved ! Haha, but it´s not that easy my friend, you will have to submit to me and do things you have never thought of. His greediness was so disgusting that I was considering to leave. But as he undressed I had to stay, to enjoy his well built body. Do you think he would get into debts again ?
title: Debt Dandy 31
